result.arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡعَوۡنَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُحۡضَرُونَ
result.translation: But those who strive against Our verses[21], seeking to discredit them, it is they who will be summoned to the punishment.
result.footnotes: [21] In order to undermine their credibility.
